i love to sing.

participant_2.background:
I love to go to the deli because I can get a sandwich that is both delicious and affordable.

i live in pittsburgh.
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger.
My dad got a job transfer so we moved to a new town.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing great! I'm just settling in to my new home in PA.
Nice! I live in Pittsburgh, PA. What part of PA did you move to?
I moved to the south hills area. It's a beautiful area.
That's great! I love living in PA. There's so much to do and see.
I agree! I'm excited to explore the area.
Have you been to any of the local delis yet?
No, I haven't. But I've heard they're really good.
They are! You should definitely check them out.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to help out a fellow PA resident.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read comic books, and I also love animals. I have a dog and a cat.
That's awesome! I love animals too. I have a dog and a cat too.
Great! What are their names?
My dog's name is Charlie, and my cat's name is Mittens.
Those are great names! My dog's name is Max, and my cat's name is Lucy.
Nice! We should get together sometime and let our pets play.
That would be great! I'd love to meet your pets.
Sounds good! We should exchange numbers so we can plan something.
Sure! What's your number
